synopsis.text: Pocket Monsters take center stage in the enchanting short film, "Meloetta no Kirakira Recital," featuring the elusive and telekinetic Pokemon, Meloetta. This 2D theatrical delight premiered alongside the 15th installment of the Pok√©mon franchise, 'Pokemon Best Wishes!: Kyurem vs. Seikenshi'. Meloetta, showcasing its captivating Aria and Pirouette forms, shares the limelight with beloved Pokemon like Pikachu, Oshawott, Axew, Totodile, Chikorita, Torchic, and Piplup, promising an exciting adventure filled with adored creatures.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
